amendment.description: To ensure that any reimbursement for services is retained for fire protection activity.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1444 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1444 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12590) To ensure that any reimbursement for services is retained for fire protection activity.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1444 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1444 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Clinton.
